pages.text: The $(d)Location Filter$() allows you to $(3)set a location$(), which is used by various items and blocks.$(br2)Set the location by using it on the block you want to set it to.
pages.title: Location Filter

pages.text: There are some other ways as well, such as using it on a $(l:blocks/biome_radar)Biome Radar$(/l) to link it to the located biome.
